definition: king/magnate/person having expert skill in something
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
Sejong the Great or Sejong Daewang (1397-1450), reigned 1418-1450 as fourth king of Joseon or Chosun dynasty, in whose reign the hangeul alphabet was invented
in the country of the blind the one-eyed man is king
pinyin: shan1 zhong1 wu2 lao3 hu3 , hou2 zi5 cheng1 dai4 wang5
containing_words.word: 山中无老虎，猴子称大王

sentences.english: King Sejong the initiative of the Han nationality's culture has been a qualitative leap.
sentences.chinese: 世宗大王的这一创举使韩民族的文化得到了质的飞跃。

sentences.english: And Jehoshaphat the king of Judah returned to his house in peace to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 犹大王约沙法平平安安地回耶路撒冷，到宫里去了。

sentences.english: Yertle the Turtle was king of the pond.
sentences.chinese: 亚特尔是池塘里的大王。

sentences.english: The lion king called the twelve zodiac meeting to discuss what row seating.
sentences.chinese: 狮子大王召集十二生肖开会，商量排座次的事。

sentences.english: Spirit thousand unreal at the last moment to give up the blast, and black king fight happened.
sentences.chinese: 灵千幻在最后关头放弃了炼丹，与黑大王发生了打斗。
他是故事大王，天生的好口才。

sentences.english: I hope he has not told you I'm a Maotai guzzler.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他没告诉你我是喝茅台酒的大王吧。

sentences.english: He could not rank as yet with the magnates of the eastthe serried sequoias of wall street .
sentences.chinese: 他还不能够同东部大王们华尔街林立的参天红杉并列。

sentences.english: The black king in ice on a non-working cannot help keep call spittor king.
sentences.chinese: 黑大王在冰牢度日如年，忍不住不停地召唤金蟾大王。

sentences.english: The black king in ice on a non-working cannot help keep call spittor king.
sentences.chinese: 黑大王在冰牢度日如年，忍不住不停地召唤金蟾大王。

sentences.english: In the twentieth year of Jeroboam king of Israel, Asa began to reign over Judah.
sentences.chinese: 以色列王耶罗波安二十年，亚撒登基作犹大王。

sentences.english: It is no tiger in the mountain, Monkey King said.
sentences.chinese: 真是山中无老虎，猴子称大王啊。

sentences.english: Creep up to a sleeping mamba , tweak it by the tail. Crikey!
sentences.chinese: 他会蹑手蹑脚的走向一条熟睡的大王蛇，扭它的尾巴。

sentences.english: I hope Your Majesty will forgive my wrongdoings and allow me to finish what I have to say.
sentences.chinese: 希望大王原谅我的罪过，让我把话说完。

sentences.english: They've been banished into the swamp by the evil Lord Farquaad.
sentences.chinese: 他们是被邪恶的法魁德大王驱逐到沼泽去。

sentences.english: Rehoboam son of Solomon was king in Judah.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门的儿子罗波安作犹大王。

definition: son of an official/son of nobility/your son (honorific)
queen/empress/imperial concubine/Goddess, esp. Xi Wangmu 王母娘娘 or 西王母, Queen Mother of the West/mother/aunt
I (first person pronoun used by royalty or nobility)
the most senior minister of many kingdoms or dynasties (with varying roles)/prime minister
